server-down.message: Apparently, (one of our) server(s) is not responding properly. Please hold on while we try to fix this issue. One the connection is established, this message will disappear automatically.
server-down.title: Oops, there is a problem

welcome.description: This is SpreaView, the platform that helps you to gain more insights in the quality of your presentations. With SpreaView, you gain more insigths in how and where to improver your sessions. We do that by collecting session review information from attendees who attended your session. After you finished your session, you can come back to this speaker dashboad to get review your review information. Below are your sessions that have been scheduled in SpeaView, and sessions that have already been reviewed with SpreaView.
welcome.speaker-error: The system could not succesfully collect your personal speaker information. Please contact the event organizer for more information.
welcome.title: Welcome on your speaker dashboard
welcome.pin-error: Too many pincode attempts, please try again later
welcome.pin-create-error: Creating your pincode failed, try again

details.description: Change the details of the speaker. Speakers that were imported from an external system cannot be altered
details.name: Name
details.read-only: This speaker cannot be altered or deleted because it is imported from an external system.
details.title: Speaker details

new-organization.create: Enter a valid organization name to create a new organization
new-organization.description: You as a conference organizer do not work alone, you are part of an organization. Please create an organization that will host your events, or join an existing organization using an invitation code.
new-organization.join: Enter a valid invitation code to join an existing organization
new-organization.name: Organization name
new-organization.subtitle: Join an existing organization or create a new one
new-organization.title: You're empty handed

new-organizer.description: Welcome to SpreaView. We're happy to have you here. Before we continue, please take a moment to check and verify your information. You are about to be registered as an organizer.
new-organizer.name: Display name
new-organizer.subtitle: Please take a moment to check and verify your information before we continue
new-organizer.title: Hi, I see you're new here

planned-events.title: Planned events
planned-events.tooltip: Shows the amount of upcoming events versus the total amount of events in the system

reviews-per-session.title: Reviews / Session
reviews-per-session.tooltip: Shows the average amount of reviews per session

speaker-engagement.title: Spkr Engagement
speaker-engagement.tooltip: Shows the engagement of speakers based on their interest in the system (did speakers visit the speaker dashboard, did they download their QR code etc.)

delete-confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
delete-confirmation.title: Are you sure?

events.prizedrawwinnerunknown: The prize draw did not take place just yet so the winner is still unknown. Please try again later.
events.prizewinner-load-failed: Failed to load prize winner data, please try again later.

organizer.create-failed: Failed to create a new organization due to an unknown error
organizer.invitation-failed: Failed to invite member for organization due to an unknown error
organizer.join-failed: Failed to join organization due to an unknown error
organizer.list-failed: Failed to fetch list from server
organizer.registration-failed: The organizer is new, but the registration process failed on the server.
organizer.resolve-failed: Failed to resolve organizer, this usually means the organizer is not registered and needs to be registered first.
organizer.update-failed: Failed to update organization due to an unknown error

review.review-date-time-indication: Sessions can only be reviewed during the review window, for this session, the review window is between {{startDateTime}} and {{endDateTime}}.

reviews.review-session-code-invalid: The session code is invalid. Session information for this session could not be found.
reviews.session-details-failed: Failed to load session information from the server. The session code is invalid or the session is not available for review.

details.free-comments: Enable free comment field for attendee reviews
details.name: Name

download.tooltip: Download the QR code to the Review URL for this room. This URL shows the review form for the session that is currently active in this room.

external-identifier.tooltip: This room is imported from an external system and cannot be altered in SpreaView.

rooms.name: Name
rooms.read-only: This room cannot be altered or deleted because it is imported from an external system.
rooms.subtitle: Rooms are locations or stages where your event presentations are held. You can create rooms here, and assign sessions to them.
rooms.title: Event Rooms

review-link.tooltip: This link will bring you to the review page of the session that started most recently in this room

sessions.help: Read more about sessions management in the SpreaView documentation online: https://docs.spreaview.com/docs/features/sessions/
sessions.read-only: This session cannot be altered because it is imported from an external system. You can only delete this session.
sessions.subtitle: Your sessions are scheduled for your event and take place in a room
sessions.title: Event sessions

details.subtitle: Change the properties of your event here to change the behavior of SpreaView for your event
details.title: Event details

five.text: Get comprehensive insights in the quality of the sessions and the popularity of the speakers. Share a personalized report with your speakers
five.title: Step 5

four.text: Provide your speakers with a QR Code and use the Rooms view to allow attendees to rate the sessions
four.title: Step 4

one.text: Register as an organizer, and create your first organization. Registration is free and takes only a couple of minutes
one.title: Step 1

three.text: Import speakers and sessions from your conference management system, or create them manually
three.title: Step 3

two.text: Create a new event, with a start- and end date. Provide more detailed properties when required to change SpreaView's behavior
two.title: Step 2

how.text: The SpreaView platform is easy to use. With just a couple of steps, you are ready to start measuring session quality and popularity.
how.title: This is how it works

partners.text: SpreaView is used by many conference organizers and speakers. We have partnerships with many organizations to provide the best possible service to our users.
partners.title: Your are not alone

about.text: SpreaView is a platform that helps conference organizers and speakers to gain more insights in the quality of their presentations. With SpreaView, speakers gain more insigths in how and where to improver their sessions, while organizers get insights in the popularity of topics and speakers.
about.title: About SpreaView

landing.subtitle: SpreaView is the got-to platform for conference organizers and speakers to gain more insights in the quality of their presentations. With SpreaView, speakers gain more insigths in how and where to improver their sessions, while organizers get insights in the popularity of topics and speakers.
landing.title: Welcome to SpreaView

invite.description: Invite a new member to your organization by entering their e-mail address. The new member will receive an invitation to join your organization.
invite.title: Invite member organization

session.description: Please take a moment to review the session '{{sessionName}}' you just attended. Your feedback is important to us and the speaker.
session.loading: Hold on, we're loading the session information for you
session.loading-error: Oops, something went wrong while loading the session information. Please try again later.
session.speaker: Speaker
session.title: Your review is gold to us

event-info.description: To improve the quality of our conference and be able to fit the content to your needs, we would like you to review the sessions you visited. Select the room you visited your session.
event-info.no-sessions-started: For this event, no sessions have started yet. Please come back later.

best-session.title: Best session
best-session.tooltip: This tile shows the best rated session for this event

best-speaker.description: For {{displayName}} based on {{reviews}} review(s) of {{sessions}} session(s)
best-speaker.title: Best speaker
best-speaker.tooltip: This tile shows the best rated speaker for this event over all sessions

reviewed-sessions.title: Reviewed sessions
reviewed-sessions.tooltip: This shows the amount of reviewed sessions, versus the total amount of sessions in the event

sessions-vs-speakers.description: You event has {{speakers}} speakers and {{sessions}} sessions
sessions-vs-speakers.title: Speakers
sessions-vs-speakers.tooltip: The number of speakers versus the number of sessions in this event

total-reviews.title: Reviews
total-reviews.tooltip: This shows the total amount of reviews given by attendees for this event

session-list.actions-toolip: Download the complete session report PDF file for this session.
session-list.title: Sessions

create.title: Create a pincode
create.description: Choose a pincode that you can remember. This pincode is used to secure your performance data and to access your speaker dashboard.

validate.title: Enter your pincode
validate.description: Enter your pincode to access your speaker dashboard
validate.pin-incorrect: The pincode is incorrect, try again

prize-draw.title: Prize draw
prize-draw.winner-description: Congratulations, you are the winner of the prize draw. Please come forward to claim your prize.
prize-draw.loser-description: Unfortunately someone just clinched the prize. Better luck next time.

errors.data-load-error: Failed to load prize draw winner. Please refresh this page to try again.
